theEnigmaCasinoDescription: It is an online multiplayer platform where users can enjoy classic casino games such as Blackjack, Poker, and Roulette, as well as other mini-games. The system is designed to offer real-time matches between multiple players, with direct interaction through WebSockets, a modern design, and an immersive experience.
